description:
Although Shuusuke didn`t remember her at first, it turns out that Iroha is Shuusuke`s childhood friend - and she knows about all of his dirty secrets.
Shuusuke is blackmailed into going on a date with Iroha, although he isn`t actually very keen on going. Nao realizes something fishy is going on, so she decides to follow him when he leaves the house and soon finds out that he is going on a date with Iroha. She decides to quietly stalk the two of them to see what happens between them.
Iroha takes Shuusuke all over the place and keeps getting bolder and bolder as the date progresses - eventually she even asks Shuusuke to help her put a swimsuit on. However she isn`t going to let it end with just that - as their date comes to a close, she invites him to do even more naughty things with her... but how is Nao going to react to hearing that?

titles.title: A Rival Appears! Brother and Sister in Big Trouble!
ライバル出現! 兄妹大ピンチ!
